name: Possessed Typewriter
description:
Possessed Typewriter is a game submission for the GMTK Game Jam 2020 with the theme of "Out of Control". This is my first ever game jam and my first solo game jam. I'm glad with how it turned out! 

The goal of this typing game is to copy the text from a piece of paper using a possessed typewriter.  You have 90 seconds. The ghost ("Ghosty") will attempt to mess with you.

Controls:
Keyboard to type in letters and punctuation.
Use Mouse to Click-and-Drag the white Handle of the typewriter to reset its position.

Sources:
Game made using Unity
Art made using FireAlpaca
Music made using BoscaCeoil
SoundFX sampled from Freesound.org
Font Another Typewriter by Johan Holmdahl
Font Veteran Typewriter by Magique Fonts

P.S. Thanks to GMTK for hosting this game jam, I had a lot of fun.
P.P.S. I think I missed the mark on the theme this year, but there's always next year!
